description: RED TEAM EVALUATION: Direct QFD-CMB fit WITHOUT ΛCDM baseline. Tests if r_ψ ≈ 147 Mpc emerges from optimization to Planck data, validating QFD photon-photon scattering hypothesis.

parameters.name: rpsi
parameters.description: ψ-field correlation scale - THE CRITICAL HYPOTHESIS. If optimizer finds ~147 Mpc (sound horizon), QFD is validated. If not, new physics emerges.

parameters.name: Aosc
parameters.description: Oscillation amplitude (unitarity bound: Aosc < 1). Determines strength of acoustic-like features.

parameters.name: A_norm
parameters.description: Overall amplitude normalization. Converts dimensionless P_ψ(k) to physical CMB units (μK²). Analogous to A_s in standard cosmology.

parameters.name: ns
parameters.description: Spectral index. Standard inflation predicts ns ≈ 0.96. Test if QFD requires different value.

parameters.name: sigma_osc
parameters.description: Gaussian damping scale for oscillations. Mimics Silk damping at high-k.

parameters.name: chi_star
parameters.description: Comoving distance to last scattering surface (z ≈ 1090). Fixed from standard cosmology.

parameters.name: sigma_chi
parameters.description: Width of last scattering visibility function. Fixed from recombination physics.
